description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
We’ve redesigned the email layout and shipped several notable improvements across navigation, scheduling, and file sharing.
New additions:
- Share meeting notes as emails via a dedicated button above each note.
- Find shared availability faster by pasting a list of addresses into Meet With.
- Fetch new messages on demand using the Check New Email button in the sidebar.
- See previously viewed emails in a dedicated Recently Seen folder.
- Control avatars and preview lines in Settings > Appearance.
Improvements:
- Emails and cards use a new layout for faster navigation.
- Split View now shows clearer separation between the email list and viewer.
- Mark as Done and Close buttons have more space between them to prevent misclicks.
- Active account names are clearly visible when viewing a specific account.
- Unread Cards now follow the account order from the sidebar.
- Recent search queries can be cleared by hovering and clicking X.
- Snooze, Send Later, and Reminders now support custom times.
This update brings changes many of you asked for. Let us know what you think — email support@sparkmailapp.com to share your feedback.

P.S. If you encounter any issues with the automatic update, please use the following link to download the update manually: https://downloads.sparkmailapp.com/Spark3/win/dist/3.27.5.126936/Spark.exe
